text: It's not like I'm sitting at home coming up with some secret beauty plan.
author: Lara Stone

text: One of the basic things about a string is that it can vibrate in many different shapes or forms, which gives music its beauty.
author: Edward Witten

text: Every one who has a heart, however ignorant of architecture he may be, feels the transcendent beauty and poetry of the mediaeval churches.
author: Goldwin Smith

text: Personal beauty is a greater recommendation than any letter of reference.
author: Fanny Brice

text: We live in a state with a wonderful climate and plenty of natural beauty, from the shores of Cumberland Island to the Chattahoochee River to the Blue Ridge Mountains.
author: Roy Barnes
